Question 1) Config question:-
I am using heritrix-1.14.0-RC1. I wish to crawl the website
http://www.example.com/ . I set the value of user-agent and its email
address.

I created a new job and selected HostScope crawl as the crawl-order
scope.  Despite this it seems to be crawling other websites like
http://www.example2.com/ or subdomains like
http://subdomain.example.com/ . All the remaining options were left to
default as per the profile.

Also I don't want it to crawl images, videos etc. The images and
videos have the proper file extensions and we can limit their crawl by
extension rather than mime-type. I tried to configure this but failed.

I found using DecidingScope/ DecidingFilter quite confusing. Perhaps
it was because I could not configure it properly. Same happened trying
to use HostScope.

Can you guide me to a tutorial of help me create the config file for
this kind of crawling scenario.

Question 2) Checkpoint question:
I pause a job, checkpoint it. Shutdown the heritrix server. To resume
the job (once I start heritrix again) I got to the new job via
recovery page. Now should I click the link titled 'recovery-log' or
the link with the greatest checkpoint number for that job.

Thanks in advance.
